titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation inhibiting the resort of His Maiesties people to the court, for cure of the kings euill, vntill the middle of Lent, and to restraine the accesse of others from infected places.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at the Court at Whitehall, the eighth day of Nouember, in the seuenth yeere of His Maiesties Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.

person.persName: the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: and
